abstract: The F.C.C. has asked the Supreme Court to review a federal appellate court decision that rejected an effort by the commission to enforce indecency standards.
snippet: The F.C.C. has asked the Supreme Court to review a federal appellate court decision that rejected an effort by the commission to enforce indecency standards.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 2 (Dow Jones) — The Federal Communications Commission has asked the Supreme Court to review a federal appellate court decision that rejected an effort by the commission to enforce indecency standards.

headline.main: F.C.C. Case Is Appealed to Justices
headline.print_headline: F.C.C. Case Is Appealed To Justices
